name: 2nd Unryu-class Aircraft Carrier, Amagi
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When a climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Amagi, flagship of the Carrier Squadron, heading out!

name: Taiho-class Armored Aircraft Carrier, Taiho Kai
text: 【CONT】 If the number of climax in your waiting room is two or less, this card gets +1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When your opponent uses an 【ACT】, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Today's winds are good… Aircraft Carrier Taiho, heading out!

name: During the Festival, Urakaze
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Destroyer》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Admiral, I'm pretty good at Festival shooting booths.

name: Taiho-class Armored Aircraft Carrier, Taiho
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "1st Task Force, heading out!" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I'll show you the true strength of the newest and most advanced Armored Carrier!

name: 1st Shokaku-class Aircraft Carrier, Shokaku Kai-II
text: 【CONT】 When your other 《Fleet Girl》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【ACT】 effect of a card named "1st Shokaku-class Armored Aircraft Carrier, Shokaku Kai-II Type.Kou", when damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your stock] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is 【REST】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "1st Shokaku-class Armored Aircraft Carrier, Shokaku Kai-II Type.Kou" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: New Fifth Carrier Division flagship Shokaku, heading out!

name: 2nd Shokaku-class Aircraft Carrier, Zuikaku Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【ACT】 effect of "2nd Shokaku-class Armored Aircraft Carrier, Zuikaku Kai-II Type.Kou", look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Fleet Girl》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your stock] At the beginning of your encore step, if this card is 【REST】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "2nd Shokaku-class Armored Aircraft Carrier, Zuikaku Kai-II Type.Kou" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Mobile Squad flagship Zuikaku! Anchors aweigh! Follow my lead!

name: 1st Shokaku-class Armored Aircraft Carrier, Shokaku Kai-II Type.Kou
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, when the damage you received is not canceled, if this card is in the center stage, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a yellow card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】) 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] Put this card into your waiting room. Choose a card named "1st Shokaku-class Aircraft Carrier, Shokaku Kai-II" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: You ready, Zuikaku? Don't fall behind. Mobile Squad, anchors aweigh!

name: 2nd Shokaku-class Armored Aircraft Carrier, Zuikaku Kai-II Type.Kou
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul. 【AUTO】 [Put a yellow character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] Put this card into your waiting room. Choose a card named "2nd Shokaku-class Aircraft Carrier, Zuikaku Kai-II" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Shokaku, let's do this! Bows windward, Attack Squadron, take off!

name: 3rd Yugumo-class Destroyer, Kazagumo
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When a climax is put on your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Fleet Girl》 character, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn. (The revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavorText: Admiral… did you call for me?

name: 16th Kagero-class Destroyer, Arashi
text: 【CONT】 If you have another card named "17th Kagero-class Destroyer, Hagikaze", this card gets "【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.". 【CONT】 All of your other cards named "15th Kagero-class Destroyer, Nowaki" get +1 soul. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Hm...? Commander, what's wrong? Are you lonely? That can't be. Heh heh.

name: 17th Kagero-class Destroyer, Hagikaze
text: 【CONT】 If you have another card named "16th Kagero-class Destroyer, Arashi", this card gets "【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.". 【CONT】 All of your other cards named "18th Kagero-class Destroyer, Maikaze" get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your 《Fleet Girl》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Yes, Hagikaze is here.

name: 14th Yugumo-class Destroyer, Okinami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and return it to his or her hand. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: U-Um～ Commander? Did you call for Okinami?

name: 3rd Unryu-class Aircraft Carrier, Katsuragi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if a card named "Let me show you the true power of a re-modelled Hiryu-class!!" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to two cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Give me your best carrier plane. Do you understand?

name: 2nd Akizuki-class Destroyer, Teruzuki
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Main guns, get ready for aerial combat!" is in your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Fleet Girl》 character, put it into your hand. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText:
Admiral, are you interested in Anti-Aircraft Artillery?
Would you... like to try touching Teruzuki's?

name: 15th Kagero-class Destroyer, Nowaki
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Fleet Girl》 characters.
flavorText: Hm? Commander, do you want something from Nowaki?

name: Delicious Season, Isokaze
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Fleet Girl》 characters in front of this card get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Commander… Sorry, forget about it.

name: 6th Yugumo-class Destroyer, Takanami
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have any other characters, this character gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to two cards from the top of your opponent's deck, and put them on the top of his or her deck in the original order.
flavorText: Hwah…! Y-You surprised me…

name: 16th Yugumo-class Destroyer, Asashimo
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have any other 【REST】 characters in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: Me? I'm heading out!

name: 2nd Unryu-class Aircraft Carrier, Amagi Kai
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other cards named "2nd Unryu-class Aircraft Carrier, Amagi".
flavorText: It's Amagi's turn!

name: 6th Yugumo-class Destroyer, Takanami Kai
flavorText: Commander? Did you… maybe call for Takanami?

name: During the Festival, Hamakaze
text: 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is not canceled, put this card into your waiting room.
flavorText: Admiral, Autumn Festivals mean… Mm, munch, mm, munch, munch, very delicious things. Hamakaze, is really enjoying them.

name: 16th Yugumo-class Destroyer, Asashimo Kai
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top three cards of your opponent's deck into his or her waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Ah- you can leave it to me. Escort missions or night combat.

name: 3rd Unryu-class Aircraft Carrier, Katsuragi Kai
text: 【CONT】 If the number of 《Fleet Girl》 characters you have is four or more, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When you level up, this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [(1)]" until end of turn.
flavorText: Aircraft Carrier Katsuragi, preparations complete!

name: 4th Akizuki-class Destroyer, Hatsuzuki
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Sis, leave this to me" is in your climax area, choose up to one of your other characters, return it to your hand, this card gets +3500 power until end of turn, and at the beginning of your encore step, put this card into your stock.
flavorText:
It's you again. What, are you feeling lonely? You're an adult, aren't you?
…Very well. I'll protect you... to the very end.

name: Hishi Mochi
text: 【COUNTER】 Put this card into your memory. If the number of 《Fleet Girl》 characters you have is four or more, search your deck for up to X 《Fleet Girl》 characters, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. X is equal to the number of cards named "Hishi Mochi" in your memory.
flavorText: A delicious "Hishi Mochi" that can only be found during the Peach Festival season.

name: 1st Task Force, heading out!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: My brilliant pilots, show them your real power!

name: Let me show you the true power of a re-modelled Hiryu-class!!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Here I come! Attack Squadron, launch all operational aircrafts, let's go!

name: Main guns, get ready for aerial combat!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)
flavorText:
Teruzuki, heading out～!
Take aim, fire!

name: Sis, leave this to me
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one yellow card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
Enemy fleet sighted.
There are a lot of them… prepare for bombardment, let's go!

name: 3rd Admiral Hipper-class Heavy Cruiser, Prinz Eugen
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Aim carefully…… Feuer!" is in your climax area, and you have another green character, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck, and this card gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText:
Guten Morgen!
I'm the Heavy Cruiser Prinz Eugen. Nice to meet you!

name: 1st Bismarck-class Battleship, Bismarck drei
text: 【CONT】 If you have a card named "1st Bismarck-class Battleship, Bismarck" in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to three cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Fleet warfare… I can hardly wait!" is in your climax area, put up to two cards from the top of your deck into your stock, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I shall show you how Bismarck fights!

name: 1st Bismarck-class Battleship, Bismarck
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of climax in your opponent's waiting room is three or more, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: Gut. It is Bismarck's turn.

name: U-boat IXC-class Submarine, U-511
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of your opponent's characters. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Ro-number Submarine, Ro-500" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as 【REST】.
flavorText: I know. That's this fleet's greeting, right? How strange.

name: 1st Graf Zeppelin-class Aircraft Carrier, Graf Zeppelin Kai
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose a card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
flavorText: What is it? Please relax. I am maintaining the flight decks regularly. There is no need to worry.

name: Ro-number Submarine, Ro-500
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Fleet Girl》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Ro-number Submarine, heading out!" is in your climax area, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Yes! It's me, Ro!

name: 3rd Admiral Hipper-class Heavy Cruiser, Prinz Eugen Kai
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a card named "3rd Admiral Hipper-class Heavy Cruiser, Prinz Eugen" in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the cost of the character facing this card. 【AUTO】 [(3) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to one time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavorText: Heavy Cruiser Prinz Eugen, heading out!

name: 3rd Z1-class Destroyer, Z3
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you level up, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your 《Fleet Girl》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
You… Is that some kind of tactical operation?
Really? …Hmm, I see…

name: During the Festival, Jintsu Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock & Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one climax, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Watch the fireworks together? ……Ah, gladly……

name: 3rd Takao-class Heavy Cruiser, Maya Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."
flavorText:
It's the awesome Air Defense Heavy Cruiser, Maya! Anti-Aircraft warfare?
Okay, leave it to me! Just hide behind me!

name: 1st Bismarck-class Battleship, Bismarck zwei
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "1st Bismarck-class Battleship, Bismarck zwei" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText:
Admiral, your fleet seems a bit lacking in discipline.
I'll educate them from scratch.

name: 1st Akatsuki-class Destroyer, Akatsuki Kai-II
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Destroyer》 characters. 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose one of your 《Destroyer》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: A-hem! While you were away, Akatsuki looked after the base all by myself.

name: 1st Z1-class Destroyer, Z1 zwei
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of other 《Fleet Girl》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the level of the character facing this card is three or higher, this card gets +3000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: It's time to head out. But, try to be wary of mines.

name: 1st Z1-class Destroyer, Z1
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is not a 《Fleet Girl》 character, 【REST】 this card. (The revealed card is returned to its original place) 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If there are no markers underneath this card, put the top card of your deck underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Put a marker from underneath this card into your stock.
flavorText: Einen sch?nen Tag.

name: 1st Furutaka-class Heavy Cruiser, Furutaka Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may reveal your hand. If you do, and there is a climax among those cards, choose a character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I can boast even to Mikawa Fleet's comrades.

name: 4th Takao-class Heavy Cruiser, Chokai Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to two cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in the original order. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: They're there… As calculated, we've found them. Enemy fleet sighted! All ships, begin the assault!

name: 7th Ayanami-class Destroyer, Oboro Kai
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Destroyer》 character, you may put that card face down underneath this card as a marker. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I won't let you do that!

name: 10th Ayanami-class Destroyer, Ushio Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 When you level up, this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [(1)]" until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm hoping that it will reduce the number of air raids, would you like to put some on too, Admiral?

name: A Midsummer Moment, Akebono
flavorText: I said, stop staring at me, you mean Admiral!

name: 3rd Z1-class Destroyer, Z3 zwei
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Fleet Girl》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: We will show you our true power. Anchors aweigh!

name: 4th Hatsuharu-class Destroyer, Hatsushimo Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Fleet Girl》 character in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
flavorText: Heading out, I see. Let's buck up and do our best!

name: 1st Bismarck-class Battleship, Bismarck Kai
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (You cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavorText: Battleship Bismarck, anchors aweigh! Let's head out!

name: 2nd Furutaka-class Heavy Cruiser, Kako Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, put this card into your waiting room. (Even though there is no battle opponent, the attack does not becomes a direct attack)
flavorText: Hmm, very well! So it's my turn. Let's go-!

name: 1st Graf Zeppelin-class Aircraft Carrier, Graf Zeppelin
text: 【CONT】 If the number of your other 《Fleet Girl》 characters is two or more, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power.
flavorText: So I'm up next, very well.

name: Class S Type.Kou Medal
text: Search your deck for up to two 《Fleet Girl》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: A proof of victory awarded to admirals who, together with elite fleet girls, have been triumphant over battles of high difficulties.

name: Fleet warfare… I can hardly wait!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Let's head out!

name: Aim carefully…… Feuer!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Feuer！　Feuer！

name: Ro-number Submarine, heading out!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Enemy ship, sighted! Here I go, fire-!

name: Akitsushima-class Seaplane Tender, Akitsushima Kai
text: 【CONT】 If the number of your other characters is one or less, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to the open right position of your center stage. (You can only move it to the stage position on the right)
flavorText: Even now, it is time for Akitsushima-style combat navigation technique. Maybe I can head out!

name: 2nd Katori-class Training Cruiser, Kashima
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Fleet Girl》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "Marine Escort Corp Flagship Kashima, anchors aweigh" is in your climax area, you may deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of your opponent's 【REVERSE】 characters. (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Admiral. Today I, Kashima, shall be undertaking the position of secretary ship, okay?

name: 1st Fubuki-class Destroyer, Fubuki Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to one card, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(3) Put two cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of other 《Destroyer》 characters you have. (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Commence Fire! Go-!

name: 2nd Kazahaya-class Transport Ship, Hayasui
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Offshore Supply" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: A supply mission, admiral? I'll do my best.

name: Akitsushima-class Seaplane Tender, Akitsushima
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When a card named "I think I've found it!" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your other characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Fleet Girl》 character, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." (The revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavorText: This Type-2 Flying Boat Taitei-chan? I won't give it to you!

name: 6th Nagara-class Light Cruiser, Abukuma Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a climax, you may deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText:
Everyone, please follow my instructions.
Mm, please follow them!

name: 1st Fuso-class Aircraft Battleship, Fuso Kai-II
text: 【CONT】 Experience If cards named "1st Fuso-class Aircraft Battleship, Fuso Kai-II" and "2nd Fuso-class Aircraft Battleship, Yamashiro Kai-II" are in your level, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "2nd Fuso-class Aircraft Battleship, Yamashiro Kai-II" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Yamashiro, don't fall behind. We're heading out!

name: 2nd Fuso-class Aircraft Battleship, Yamashiro Kai-II
text: 【CONT】 Experience If a card named "1st Fuso-class Aircraft Battleship, Fuso Kai-II" is in your level, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "1st Fuso-class Aircraft Battleship, Fuso Kai-II", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: I wonder if big sister is fighting too…?

name: 1st Katori-class Training Cruiser, Katori
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another card named "2nd Katori-class Training Cruiser, Kashima", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's characters, and move it to another open position of his or her stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: I'm Katori, a Training Cruiser. Don't worry… I'll be gentle in teaching you various things.

name: 2nd Kazahaya-class Transport Ship, Hayasui Kai
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Fleet Girl》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you play a card named "Offshore Supply", choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
Hayasui's Fleet, flagship Hayasui, anchors aweigh!
Eh heh, I've always wanted to say that.

name: 1st Mutsuki-class Destroyer, Mutsuki Kai-II
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each of your other cards named "2nd Mutsuki-class Destroyer, Kisaragi Kai-II" in your center stage.
flavorText: The remodeled Mutsuki's battle… begins now! Commence fire～!

name: 2nd Mutsuki-class Destroyer, Kisaragi Kai-II
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each of your other cards named "1st Mutsuki-class Destroyer, Mutsuki Kai-II" in your center stage.
flavorText: Let Kisaragi come with you. Okay?

name: 5th Fubuki-class Destroyer, Murakumo Kai-II
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: The power of remodeled Murakumo, will finally be demonstrated on the battlefield!

name: Mizuho-class Seaplane Tender, Mizuho
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of other 《Fleet Girl》 characters you have is four or more, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Fleet Girl》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Did you call for Mizuho? I'm so happy.

name: Offshore Supply
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your 《Fleet Girl》 characters, and that character gets +3500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: When a battleship has a shortage of fuel and ammunition at sea, "Offshore Supply" is activated, and both items are "supplied" offshore.

name: Marine Escort Corp Flagship Kashima, anchors aweigh
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Flagship Kashima, heading out, please follow me, everyone!

name: I think I've found it!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Enemy fleet, sighted, I think! All fleets, prepare for battle-!

name: 2nd Vittorio Veneto-class Battleship, Italia
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand by the 【ACT】 effect of "2nd Vittorio Veneto-class Battleship, Littorio", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When your other 《Fleet Girl》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put a card named "A Midsummer Moment, Littorio" from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to one time per turn. When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "Let me show you Italia's true power!" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavorText: Turret number one, number two, aiming… Fire, now!

name: 9th Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer, Kawakaze
text: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your clock] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Fleet Girl》 character, put it into your hand. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Mm, nice! It's doable-!

name: A Midsummer Moment, Littorio
text: 【AUTO】 When you level up, put this card into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, your opponent may choose a character in your waiting room, and put it on the top of your deck.
flavorText: Admiral, it's summer. Let's go to the beach together.

name: 3rd Maestrale-class Destroyer, Libeccio
text: 【CONT】 This card gets -1 level while on the stage. 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText: Behold! I'll show you, the appeal of an Italian Destroyer! Libeccio, heading out!

name: Interlude of the Rain, Murasame Kai
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Destroyer》 characters you have. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Murasame will listen if it is alright with you. What is it about?

name: 6th Asashio-class Destroyer, Yamagumo
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a 《Destroyer》 character from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your clock] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to two cards named "5th Asashio-class Destroyer, Asagumo Kai" or "6th Asashio-class Destroyer, Yamagumo Kai", reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Did you call for Yamagumo～

name: 1st Zara-class Heavy Cruiser, Zara
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Fleet Girl》 character, put it into your hand. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: I'll show you Zara's tenaciousness with this battle!

name: 3rd Myoko-class Heavy Cruiser, Ashigara Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 [(3) Put two cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for three cards, reveal them to your opponent, if all those cards are characters with the same card name, put them into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if they are not, shuffle your deck.
flavorText:
Like I said!
I can take care of my own equipment…… Eh, that's not it?

name: 10th Asashio-class Destroyer, Kasumi Kai-II
text: 【CONT】 All of your other cards named "10th Asashio-class Destroyer, Kasumi Kai-II" get +1500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】 from your opponent character's 【AUTO】 effects." 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] Put this card into your waiting room. Choose a card named "10th Asashio-class Destroyer, Kasumi Kai-II-Otsu" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: I just can't sit by and watch!

name: 10th Asashio-class Destroyer, Kasumi Kai-II-Otsu
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When your other card named "10th Asashio-class Destroyer, Kasumi Kai-II-Otsu" attacks, if a card named "Kasumi, anchors aweigh! Please follow me!" is in your climax area, and this card is in your center stage, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may draw a card. (Climax are regarded as level 0) 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your characters] Put this card into your waiting room. Choose a card named "10th Asashio-class Destroyer, Kasumi Kai-II" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: What is it, supplies!? …Well, I do need them.

name: 2nd Myoko-class Heavy Cruiser, Nachi Kai-II
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is a higher level than this card, this card cannot frontal attack. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Now, I'll have you watch Nachi's battle closely!

name: 2nd Vittorio Veneto-class Battleship, Littorio
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【CONT】 If your level is three or higher, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose a card named "2nd Vittorio Veneto-class Battleship, Italia" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on." 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When a card named "Let me show you Italia's true power!" is placed on your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Fleet Girl》 character, put it into your hand. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: With this, I even won't lose to Roma! Eh heh heh♪

name: 4th Vittorio Veneto-class Battleship, Roma Kai
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets -1 level and +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Roma of the Vittorio Veneto-class. Advance! I'm going all out, follow me!

name: 1st Shoho-class Light Aircraft Carrier, Shoho Kai
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Fleet Girl》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Second Attack Squadron, can you form up? Then, prepare for launch!

name: Happy Halloween Roma
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the number of other characters you have is one or less, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character on any position of your back stage.
flavorText: Grazie. With this… With this I can probably go on.

name: Happy Halloween Libeccio
flavorText: How does this look on Libe? Does it look good? Really-? Yay-! Eh heh heh♪

name: 5th Asashio-class Destroyer, Asagumo Kai
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power and +1 soul for each of your other cards named "6th Asashio-class Destroyer, Yamagumo Kai".
flavorText: 9th Destroyer Division, heading out! Yamagumo, as always… will be with you!

name: 6th Asashio-class Destroyer, Yamagumo Kai
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power and +1 soul for each of your other cards named "5th Asashio-class Destroyer, Asagumo Kai".
flavorText: Oh～ my sis, Asagumo? Want to go together～?

name: 5th Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer, Harusame Kai
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each marker underneath this card. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you play a card named "Drum Can(Transport Use)", you may put the top card of your deck underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Let's work hard for today's transport mission. Transporting and escorting are important.

name: 7th Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer, Umikaze
text: 【CONT】 Experience If a card named "9th Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer, Kawakaze" is in your level, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of your other 《Fleet Girl》 characters is four or more, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: Ah, thank you for the resupply. It helps a lot.

name: 4th Vittorio Veneto-class Battleship, Roma
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Fleet Girl》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When a card named "I'm going all out, follow me!" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to one card named "4th Vittorio Veneto-class Battleship, Roma Kai" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Admiral, do you have any orders for Roma?

name: A Midsummer Moment, Yudachi Kai-II
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Destroyer》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a blue card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: I can, like, easily move in these. Like!

name: Combat Rations
text: Put the top card of your deck into your clock. If that card is a 《Fleet Girl》 character, draw up to three cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. Put this card into your memory.
flavorText: Being hungry is kind of…… Let's make sure to fill our stomachs before battle.

name: Let me show you Italia's true power!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Enemy fleet sighted! Ready the cannons! Finally, actual combat.

name: Kasumi, anchors aweigh! Please follow me!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one blue card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: My resolution is firm. Now, all that's left is action! Let's do this!

name: I'm going all out, follow me!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: Artillery, get ready. Alright, here we go. All gunports…Open!

name: 3rd Kagero-class Destroyer, Kuroshio Kai
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Fleet Girl》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText: Well then! Commence the gunfire assault!

name: 8th Mutsuki-class Destroyer, Nagatsuki Kai
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: A new comrade? I'm looking forward to it.

name: 2nd Kongo-class Battleship, Hiei Kai
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack."
flavorText: Yes! I feel a surge of power!

name: 10th Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer, Suzukaze Kai
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Yeah! I've been waiting for this!

name: 7th Kagero-class Destroyer, Hatsukaze
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Fleet Girl》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 During the attack phase, when your character or your opponent's character is returned to hand from the waiting room, all of that player's characters get -3 soul until end of turn.

name: 1st Akatsuki-class Destroyer, Akatsuki Kai
text: 【CONT】 You can put up to four cards with the same card name as this card and cards named "A Winter Moment, Akatsuki" in your deck. 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Newly Constructed Repair Ship, Akashi
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Fleet Girl》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to one 《Fleet Girl》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: 5th Mutsuki-class Destroyer, Satsuki Kai-II
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a card named "5th Mutsuki-class Destroyer, Satsuki" in your waiting room and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.

name: 2nd Asashio-class Destroyer, Oshio Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn)

name: Flagship of the 8th Fleet, Chokai Kai-II
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Fleet Girl》 characters you have.
